helps reduce the harmful effects of vaccines. This product is recommended to prevent and relieve symptoms that may occur during a vaccination, such as: apprehension, fear of shots, fevers, 2 sprays under the tongue 3 times a day, starting if possible 3 days before the vaccination and for 21 days afterwards.
